title: Baba, niwaju ite Re
verse 1:
f	Baba, niwaju ite Re
 L’angeli nteriba;
Nigba gbogbo niwaju Re
Ni nwon nkorin iyin
di	Nwon si nfi ade wura won,
Lele yi ‘te na ka;cr	Nwon nfi ohun pelu duru
Korin si Oluwa
verse 2:
mf	Didan Osumare si ntan
Si ara iye won;cr	Bi Seraf ti nke si Seraf,
Ti nwon nkorin ‘yin Re
P	Bi a ti kunle nihinyi,
Ran ore Re si wa;
K’ a mo pe ‘Wo wa nitosi,
Lati da wa lohun.

title: Father, before Thy Throne of light
verse 1:
f	Father, before Thy Throne of light
The guardian Angel bend.
And ever in Thy presence bright
Their psalms adoring Thee
di	And casting down each golden crown.
Besides the crystal sea.
cr	With voice and Lyre, in happy choir
Hymn glory, Lord to Thee.
verse 2:
mf	And as the rainbow lustre falls
Ath wart their glowing wings
cr	While seraph unto seraph calls
And each Thy goodness sings;
P	So we may feel low as we kneel
To pray Thee for Thy grace
That Thou art here, for all who fear
The brightness of Thy face.
verse 3:
mf	Here, where the Angels see us come
To worship day by day,
cr	Teach s to seek our heavenly home,
And serve Thee o’er as they;
f	With them to raise our notes of praise
With Them thy love to own.
Thy childhood’s flower and manhood’s power
Be Thine, and Thine alone.	Amen
